CASTLE_GATE.long_desc: You are standing outside a castle gate. The entrance to the castle is to the east.

CASTLE_COURTYARD.long_desc: You are inside the castle. This is a large courtyard. A large Opening leads east. Openings lead north and south. You can exit the castle to the west. A ladder leads down to a dark tunnel, and a stairway leads upwards.

DUNGEON.long_desc: You are deep in the dungeon. Openings lie to the North and South. A rickety ladder climbs back up.

CELLBLOCK_1.long_desc: There isn't much to see. Cells line one wall. An exit leads south

CELLBLOCK_2.long_desc: There isn't much to see. Cells line one wall. An exit leads north

LOOKOUT_WALKWAY.long_desc: A plain walkway leads from north to south, a tower at each end. A stairway leads down.

TOWER_1.long_desc: This is a round room with a 360 degree view of your surroundings. An opening leads south and a stairway leads down.

TOWER_2.long_desc: This is a round room with a 360 degree view of your surroundings. An opening leads north.

GUARDS_QUARTERS.long_desc: This room originally housed the guards of the castle. This place would be bustling with activity, but now is completely empty. On one side of the room lie several beds. Openings lead north, northeast, and south. A stairway winds upwards.

KITCHENS.long_desc: This kitchen is full of kitchen utensils, but nothing worth taking. The only exit is to the north.

STABLES.long_desc: These are the stables for the horses that lived in the castle. Brushes and saddles lie around, but there isn't anything worth taking. An exit lies to the north.

ARMORY.long_desc: This is the castle armory. You see weapon, shield, and armor stands, but they are empty aside from a few rusty helmets.

TRAINING_COURTYARD.long_desc: This is a courtyard used to train guards and knights. You can see a few straw dummies, most destroyed. Openings are to the west and southwest.

HALLWAY.long_desc: This is a long hallway with openings to the east and west. The walls are adorned with coats of arms. Doorways lead north, south, northeast, northwest, southwest, and southeast.

BEDROOM_1.long_desc: This bedroom would probably be used by a noble. There isn't much to see.

BEDROOM_2.long_desc: This bedroom would probably be used by a noble. There isn't much to see.

BEDROOM_3.long_desc: This bedroom would probably be used by a noble. There isn't much to see.

BEDROOM_4.long_desc: This bedroom would probably be used by a noble. There isn't much to see.

BEDROOM_5.long_desc: This bedroom would probably be used by a noble. There isn't much to see.

BEDROOM_6.long_desc: This bedroom would probably be used by a noble. There isn't much to see.

DINING_HALL.long_desc: This is where everybody in the castle would eat. There is a special platform where the king and his advisers would sit. Openings lead north, south, east, and west.
